message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.IR 

The paper discusses the automatic generation of infographics from natural language statements, which involves aspects of human-computer interaction (cs.HC), natural language processing (cs.CL), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also involves the design of the infographics, which could fall under computer graphics (cs.GR) or information retrieval (cs.IR) as it involves presenting information in a visual format.
